pages.text: The $(item)Sculk Transmitter$() is a mandatory block for item transportation over longer distances. Similar to a $(thing)Repeater$(), it is able to receive signals from $(l:sculktransporting:sculk_emitter)$(item)Sculk Emitters$() or other $(item)Transmitters$() and tries to re-broadcast them to other $(item)Sculk Transmitters$() or $(l:sculktransporting:sculk_receiver)$(item)Receivers$().

pages.title: Crafting:
pages.text: $(item)Sculk Transmitters$() cannot be modified, as they already work with maximum efficiency. Their vibrations can travel up to $(thing)8 blocks$(), with a speed of $(thing)20 blocks per second$(), and can be occluded with $(thing)Wool$() and similar blocks.
